Author: tholin
Content: Why is global routing run twice? Its a step that takes forever in some of my flows and its run twice.

Author: 246tnt
Content: I don't think it should be run twice ... I only see it once in Chip flow.

Author: tholin
Content: Its run first as its own step

Author: tholin
Content: Then a third time actually, but after Antenna Repair has inserted new cells, so that checks out.

Author: tholin
Content: I have a flow where global routing takes 15 minutes each time, so that is 45 minutes of just global routing.

Author: tholin
Content: But yeah, Antenna Repair runs GRT before doing anything and I’m wondering why it can’t pull that data from the database from when GRT was run as its own step.
